events.message: I ordered a package two weeks ago, but it still hasn’t arrived yet. The tracking information hasn't been updated in days, and I'm really worried about the delay.
The customer’s message mentions a late delivery and outdated tracking information, so the issue is categorized under Delivery Delay.
The support system assigned the case to the Delivery Support Team to handle the customer’s shipping delay query.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand your package is delayed, and I’m here to help you track it and resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking ID so I can look into the shipping status for you?
Sure, the order number is 987654321 and the tracking ID is TRK123456789. I haven’t seen any updates on the tracking page since last Wednesday.

I’ve checked with the courier and your package was delayed due to transit issues. We expect it to be delivered within the next 3 days. I will also arrange for expedited shipping at no extra cost to you.
Thank you for the update and for arranging the expedited shipping. I appreciate your prompt assistance in resolving my concern.
We have successfully addressed the delay issue and expedited your package delivery. Please expect your order within three days.
Just following up to confirm that your package has arrived and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you still need any assistance.
As there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience, and feel free to contact us anytime.
